segments.text: What do you think this flat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not really all that good.The bedroom is a little small for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Small ? But it should be enough for our needs , I think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But there's no hot water after 10 at night.Sometimes I like to have a hot shower before bed , especially in the winter , it feels good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true , but I love the living room , it's huge and filled with sunshine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True , and I like the kitchen.It ' s new and well equipped .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has a great balcony with an incredible view of the park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right.The view is spectacular.But that bedroom is so small.We ' d never be able to fit all of our stuff in there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May be we could get some new furniture , better stuff .
segments.speaker: S1
